PHRASE.LANG: Super Powered Peep is fueled by Heavy Water for all of his mad skills! As a Companion Peep he will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your super hero side-kick! [#Legal]
Super Powered Peep est alimente par Heavy Water pour tous ses talents de fou! Comme Compagnon Peep, il te suivra partout et sera ton super héro complice![#Legal]

Angetrieben von Heavy Water ist Super Powered Peep bereit für alle seine verrückten Fähigkeiten! Als ein Freundschafts-Peep wird er dir zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist dein Kumpan und Superheld![#Legal]
Super Powered Peep é alimentato da Heavy Water dovuto alle sue straordinarie abilitá! Come Companion Peep ti seguirá in casa e diventerá una comparsa di super eroe![#Legal]
Super Powered Peep es impulsado por Heavy Water debido a sus tremendas habilidades! Como Companion Peep te seguirá en tu casa y será tu superhéroe patiño![#Legal]
Super Powered Peep을 Heavy Water로 충전하여 환상의 스킬을 경험해 보세요! 컴패니언 Peep으로 온 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 훌륭한 벗이 되어 줄거에요. [#Legal]
Super Powered Peep is fueled by Heavy Water for all of his mad skills! As a Companion Peep he will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your super hero side-kick! [#Legal]
Super Powered Peep由Heavy Water提供動力，使出瘋狂的技巧！作為隨身夥伴Peep，他會在PS Home伴您左右，並成為您的英雄！ [#Legal]
Super Powered Peep由Heavy Water提供動力，使出瘋狂的技巧！作為隨身夥伴Peep，他會在PS Home伴您左右，並成為您的英雄！ [#Legal]
Super Powered Peep is fueled by Heavy Water for all of his mad skills! As a Companion Peep he will follow you throughout Home and will be your super hero side-kick![#Legal]
